reviewText: I hope this, and other Vocaloid DVDs are brought back into inventory, I can't wait to purchase this and others of Vocaloid. I find the music and CG singers to be fantastic. When I first watched one concert, via a friend, I was not aware that the voices were generated by computer, but even after realizing that they were, it still sounded and looked great.

The product was in great condition and arrived earlier than anticipated. It is not only entertaining to watch but now I can also brag to my friends about owning it. The quality of the concert is amazing and the audio is very clear. I am very glad that I bought this DVD.
